heading: comin' out
subheading: for centuries, the freemasons -- a closed male society that exerts its influence behind the scenes -- has jealously guarded its secret rituals. but this is the '90s and everybody's coming out, even the freemasons. an english branch of the group says it will reveal the "world of the secret handshake" by broadcasting its meetings on the web. what's next? a segment on oprah?
author: wired staff
text: for centuries, the freemasons -- a closed male society that exerts its influence behind the scenes -- has jealously guarded its secret rituals. but this is the '90s and everybody's coming out, even the freemasons. an english branch of the group says it will reveal the "world of the secret handshake" by broadcasting its meetings on the  web. what's next? a segment on oprah?
